TopicTitle: Load buttons not working in sandbox

Articles.Content:
im not usually one to gripe, but this is just too much first the load button in the SPH stopped working after awhile, and then the one in the VAB died too, now i cannot reload ships in either to work on... i am on the 64-bit version, and again, they worked for a long time before and then died one after the other.... suggestions?

Edited January 29, 2015 by joethebeast22

You've likely got corrupted craft files in the VAB and SPH folders in your save file. If you move out the most recent craft files in those folders until the Load dialog works again, you'll have found your busted craft.

For the most part, the corrupted craft files are frequently unrecoverable, sadly.

thanks, that fixed it, we can move this puppy to solved
